The 8th International Conference on Mechatronics Engineering (ICOM’22) is a series of conference organized by the Kulliyyah of Engineering, International Islamic University Malaysia (IIUM) and Mechatronics Engineering Department, as a part of IIUM Engineering Congress (IEC) 2022. ICOM ’22 focuses on bringing together researchers, experts and practitioners to address the latest trends and technologies in the multifaceted field of Mechatronics Engineering. This virtual event provides international platform for discussion on the following (but not limited to) topics:

  • Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
  • Advanced instrumentation and control
  • Image, Speech and Signal processing
  • Biomechatronics and rehabilitation engineering
  • Mechatronics education
  • Autonomous Vehicles and Transportation Systems
  • Fault detection and diagnosis
  • Human-machine interface
  • Robotics and Automation
  • Manufacturing mechatronics
  • Sensors and actuators
  • Smart Structures and Active vibration control
  • MEMS and NEMS

Update: All full papers sent will go through a double-blind review process and accepted papers will be published in the IET Conference Proceedings (except selected papers for journal publications). The expected publication date is to-be-announced later.

Update: Selected papers will be published in either of the following Journals:

  1. Perintis eJournal (ISSN 2232-0725) – December 2022
  2. Journal of Integrated Advanced Engineering (JIAE – ISSN 2774-6038) – September 2022 or March 2023
  3. Applied Research and Technology (ARSTech – ISSN 2722-9645) – December 2022 or June 2023

Papers published in any of these journals will not appear in the Conference Proceedings.

The conference will also confer the following awards for the participants:

BEST PAPER AWARD

BEST PRESENTATION AWARD
